item.title: Chesapeake Assessment Scenario Tool (CAST)
item.description: Developed By: CBP Summary: The Chesapeake Assessment Scenario Tool (CAST) is a web-based nitrogen, phosphorus and sediment load modeling tool designed to streamline environmental planning.

item.title: Creating Resilient Water Utilities: Climate Resilience Evaluation and Awareness Tool Risk Assessment Application for Water Utilities
item.description: Developed By: EPA Summary: Part of the Creating Resilient Water Utilities (CRWU) initiative, the Climate Resilience Evaluation and Awareness Tool (CREAT) 3.

item.title: Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online: Hampton Roads Resilience Projects Dashboard
item.description: Developed By: HRPDC, HRSD, and HRTPO Summary: Part of the Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online portal, this tool provides summary graphics and an interactive map to view current and proposed projects to improve resilience to flooding and coastal hazards in Hampton Roads, VA.
